notes: The following regulations do not apply to the lakes and tributaries of those rivers unless specified. All season dates are inclusive.

rules.notes: Inland waters and tidal waters of Lunenburg County and west of Halifax Harbour. From Sep 1 to Sep 30, no Brook Trout may be retained, and natural bait is prohibited in all waters for all Trout species, except waters with extended seasons for Trout.
rules.area: Inland Waters and Western Tidal Waters

rules.notes: Tidal waters of Halifax County (Halifax Harbour and East). From Sep 1 to Sep 30, no Brook Trout may be retained, and natural bait is prohibited in all waters for all Trout species, except waters with extended seasons for Trout.
All lake (grey) Trout must be released. Bag limit zero (0) lake Trout.
Extended Season waters. Regular bag limit applies Apr 1 - Sep 30.
rules.area: Albro Lake, Lewis Lake, Round Lake (Jerry Lawrence Park), Maynard Lake, Penhorn Lake, First Lake, Cow Bay Pond, Williams Lake (Halifax), Beck Lake, Hutt Lake, Sucker Lake (Lunenburg)

rules.notes: General regulation except for special management areas.
All Smallmouth Bass must be retained in this area. Open season coincides with the season for Trout.
rules.area: All waters east of Highway 102 from junction with Highway 104, to Highway 118 to Highway 107 to Highway 328 near Upper Lawrencetown

rules.notes: Special Bass Management Areas. From May 1 to Jun 15, no Smallmouth Bass may be retained.
rules.area: Grand Lake (Shubenacadie), Morris Lake (Halifax), Big Mushamush Lake (Lunenburg)

rules.notes: All lakes with extended seasons for Chain Pickerel are also open for Smallmouth Bass.
rules.area: Banook Lake, Micmac Lake, Red Bridge Pond, Grand Lake (Shubenacadie), Powder Mill Lake, Morris Lake, Russell Lake, Kinsac Lake, Fish Lake, Bisset Lake, Beaver Bank Lake, Beaver Pond (Halifax)

rules.notes: All Chain Pickerel must be retained. Open season coincides with the season for a sportfish.
The season corresponds with the open season for Smallmouth Bass or Trout. In areas with extended seasons, Perch may also be retained.

specialWaters.notes: Including all lakes and tributaries flowing into East Taylor Bay Lake. From Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.
From the mouth of Musquodoboit Harbour to Chapel Island. Apr 1 to Apr 30, closed to all angling for all species. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.
From a point 300m downstream from Highway 7 Bridge to Chapel Island. Apr 1 to May 31, closed to all angling. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.

From a point 300m downstream from Highway 7 Bridge (including Tom Vaughans Pool), upstream to a point 100m above Crawfords Bridge. Apr 1 to Apr 30, closed to all angling. Artificial fly only. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.
From a point 100m above Crawfords Bridge upstream to the confluence of the North and South branches near Dean. Apr 1 to Apr 30, closed to all angling for all species.

specialWaters.area: LaHave River - Silver Hill to Wentzells Lake (Lunenburg)
specialWaters.notes: From Silver Hill Brook upstream to South end of Wentzells Lake. Apr 1 to May 25, single hook lure or artificial fly only, no natural bait. From May 26 onward, artificial fly only. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.

specialWaters.area: LaHave River - Wentzells Lake to New Germany Lake (Lunenburg)
specialWaters.notes: From north end of Wentzells Lake to south end of New Germany Lake and West Branch to Rhynos Lake, North Branch to Sherbrooke Lake. Apr 1 to May 25, any gear. May 26 onward, artificial fly only. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.

From Morgans Falls to a point 90m downstream. Apr 1 to May 25, any gear. May 26 to May 31, artificial fly only. Jun 1 onward, closed to all angling for all species. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.

From Highway 331 Bridge upstream to Hebb Lake, not including Fancys Lake or tributaries. Apr 1 to Jun 14, single hook lure or artificial fly only, no natural bait. Jun 15 onward, artificial fly only. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.

Includes Birch Hill Lake, Blueberry Lake, East Duck Lake, Five Island Lake, Five Island Lake Run, Frederick Lake, Holland Marsh Lake, Hubley Big Lake, Jacket Lake, Lizard Lake, Sheldrake Lake and Woodens River (downstream from outflow of Hubley Big Lake). Single hook lure or artificial fly, natural bait is prohibited.

specialWaters.area: Minamkeak Lake, Milipsigate Lake and Hebb Lake (Lunenburg)
specialWaters.notes: Atlantic Whitefish protection. Single hook lure or artificial fly only, natural bait is prohibited. Jan 1 to Jun 30 and Oct 1 to Dec 31, closed to all angling for all species.
Upstream from the highway bridge at Moser River, not including tributaries. May 26 to end of all fishing seasons, artificial fly only.
From a point 50m below Shore Drive Bridge near Bedford to a point 200m upstream from Lucasville Road Bridge, not including tributaries. Jun 1 to end of all fishing seasons, artificial fly only.
From confluence with Sackville River upstream to outlet of Feely Lake, not including tributaries. Jun 1 to end of all fishing seasons, artificial fly only.
From concrete piers downstream of Highway 7 Bridge upstream to Killag River, not including tributaries. May 26 to end of all fishing seasons, artificial fly only.
From Highway 3 bridge upstream to Larder River, not including tributaries. May 26 to end of all fishing seasons, artificial fly only.

specialWaters.area: East River Sheet Harbour - Barrier Dam to Malay Falls (Halifax)
specialWaters.notes: From Fisheries and Oceans Canada barrier dam upstream to Malay Falls, including tributaries. Closed Apr 1 to Apr 14.

specialWaters.area: East River Sheet Harbour - Ruth Falls (Halifax)
specialWaters.notes: From Powerhouse at Ruth Falls downstream 200m, including tributaries. Closed Jun 1 to Sep 30.
From a point 23m downstream from Highway 3 bridge to a point 23m upstream from that bridge, including tributaries.
From a point 15m downstream from Highway 24 bridge to 15m upstream from that bridge, including tributaries. Closed Jun 1 to Sep 30.

specialWaters.area: West River Sheet Harbour - Highway 7 Bridge to Foot Bridge (Halifax)
specialWaters.notes: From Highway 7 bridge downstream to foot bridge. Closed Jun 15 to Jul 31.

specialWaters.area: Gold River - Highway 3 Bridge to Larder River (Lunenburg)
specialWaters.notes: From a point 200m upstream from Highway 3 Bridge to Larder River, including tributaries. Closed Apr 1 to May 14.
The Dipping Pool located between Cable Pool and Kill Devil Pool, including tributaries. Closed May 15 to Aug 15.
From Petite Riviere at Crousetown to a point 180m upstream, including tributaries. Closed Apr 1 to Sep 30.
